column3: This already exists under a different name\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/COPYING\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ef9e9ab089beefc79cde526fcad9ee401d7a1b21 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
NACK, this should be plain english IMHO, if we really need such a file.\n
There is no point in having both a COPYING and a LICENSE file, closing.\n
What language is this, and why is specifically that one included?\n
